#null 判断 ``` typeof null // “object” typeof undefined //”undefined” null == undefined //true null === undefined //false null !== undefined //true



#空字符判断

’’ ==’0’ //false ‘’ ===’0’ //false 0 == ‘’ // true 0 === ‘’ //false 0==’0’ //true 0===’0’ //false


#false判断

typeof false //”boolean” false ==’false’ //false false ===’false’ //false false ===’0’ //false false ==’0’ //true ```
